body.gatha1: ‘‘Yo brāhmaṇe bhojayi dīgharattaṃ, annena pānena yathānubhāvaṃ;
body.gathalast: Pasannacitto anumodamāno, subhoga devaññataro ahosi’’.
Sa yaññatantaṃ varato yajitvā, dibbaṃ gatiṃ mucalindajjhagacchi’’.
Hitvā apariyantaraṭṭhaṃrathaṃrathaṃ sasenaṃ, rājā dudīpopi jagāma dudīpopajjhagāmi (syā.) saggaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yo sāgarantaṃ sāgaro vijitvā, yūpaṃ subhaṃ soṇṇamayaṃsovaṇṇamayaṃsovaṇṇamayaṃ uḷāraṃ;
body.gathalast: Ussesi vessānaramādahāno, subhoga devaññataro ahosi.
Salomapādo paricariyamaggiṃ, aṅgo sahassakkhapurajjhagacchi’’.
So somayāgena malaṃ vihantvā, subhoga devaññataro ahosi’’.
Yo iddhimā devavaro yasassī, sopi tadā ādahi jātavedaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Mālāgirī himavā yo ca gijjhovijjhovijjhā , sudassano nisabho kuverukākanerukākanerukākaveru ;
body.gathalast: Ete ca aññe ca nagā mahantā, cityā katā yaññakarehi māhu’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ajjhāyakaṃ mantaguṇūpapannaṃ, tapassinaṃ yācayogotidhāhu ticāha (sī. pī.), ti cāhu (ka.);
body.gathalast: Tīre samuddassudakaṃ sajantaṃsiñcantaṃ , sāgarojjhohari tenapeyyo.
Purimaṃ disaṃ pacchimaṃ dakkhiṇuttaraṃ, saṃvijjamānā janayanti vedaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kalī hi dhīrāna kaṭaṃ magānaṃ, bhavanti vedajjhagatānariṭṭha;
body.gathalast: Marīcidhammaṃ asamekkhitattā, māyāguṇā nātivahanti paññaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Vedā na tāṇāya bhavanti dassa, mittadduno bhūnahuno narassa;
body.gathalast: Na tāyate pariciṇṇo ca aggi, dosantaraṃ maccamanariyakammaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sabbañca maccā sadhanaṃ sabhogaṃsadhanā sabhogāsadhanā sabhogāsadhanā sabhogāsadhanā sabhogā , ādīpitaṃ dāru tiṇena missaṃ;
body.gathalast: Dahaṃ na tappena tappe aggi asamatthatejo, ko taṃ subhikkhaṃ dirasañña kuriyādvirasaññu kayirādirasaññu kuriyā .
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yathāpi khīraṃ vipariṇāmadhammaṃ, dadhi bhavitvā navanītampi hoti;
body.gathalast: Evampi aggi vipariṇāmadhammo, tejo samorohatī yogayutto.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Na dissatī aggimanuppaviṭṭho, sukkhesu kaṭṭhesu navesu cāpi;
body.gathalast: Nāmatthamānonāmanthamānonāmanthamāno araṇīnarena, nākammunā jāyati jātavedo.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sace hi aggi antarato vaseyya, sukkhesu kaṭṭhesu navesu cāpi;
body.gathalast: Sabbāni susseyyu vanāni loke, sukkhāni kaṭṭhāni ca pajjaleyyuṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Karoti ce dārutiṇena puññaṃ, bhojaṃ naro dhūmasikhiṃ patāpavaṃ;
body.gathalast: Aṅgārikā loṇakarā ca sūdā, sarīradāhāpi kareyyu puññaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Atha ce hi ete na karonti puññaṃ, ajjhenamaggiṃ idha tappayitvā;
body.gathalast: Na koci lokasmiṃ karoti puññaṃ, bhojaṃ naro dhūmasikhiṃ patāpavaṃ.
Yadeva maccā parivajjayanti, tadappasatthaṃ dvirasaññu bhuñje.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sikhimpi devesu vadanti heke, āpaṃ milakkhūmilakkhāmilakkhā pana devamāhu;
body.gathalast: Sabbeva ete vitathaṃ bhaṇanti gaṇhanti (ka.), aggī na devaññataro na cāpo.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Anindriyabaddhamasaññakāyaṃnirindriyaṃ antaṃ asaññakāyaṃnirindriyaṃ antaṃ asaññakāyaṃanidriyaṃ santamasaññakāyaṃ , vessānaraṃ kammakaraṃ pajānaṃ;
body.gathalast: Paricariya maggiṃ sugatiṃ kathaṃ vaje, pāpāni kammāni pakubbamānopakūbbamānopakūbbamāno .
Sabbānubhāvī ca vasī kimatthaṃ, animmito nimmitaṃ vanditassa.
Te lābhasakkāre apātubhonte, sandhāpitāsanthambhitāsanthambhitāsandhābhitāsantāpitā jantubhi santidhammaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ajjhenamariyā pathaviṃ janindā, vessā kasiṃ pāricariyañca suddā;
body.gathalast: Upāgu paccekaṃ yathāpadesaṃ, katāhu ete vasināti āhu.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Etañca saccaṃ vacanaṃ bhaveyya, yathā idaṃ bhāsitaṃ brāhmaṇehi;
body.gatha2: Nākhattiyo jātu labhetha rajjaṃ, nābrāhmaṇo mantapadāni sikkhe;
body.gathalast: Nāññatra vessehi kasiṃ kareyya, suddo na mucce parapesanāyaparapessitāyaparapessitāya .
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yasmā ca etaṃ vacanaṃ abhūtaṃ, musāvime odariyā bhaṇanti;
body.gathalast: Tadappapaññā abhisaddahanti, passanti taṃ paṇḍitā attanāva.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Khatyā hi vessānaṃ khattā na vessā na (sī. pī.) baliṃ haranti, ādāya satthāni caranti brāhmaṇā;
body.gathalast: Taṃ tādisaṃ saṅkhubhitaṃ pabhinnaṃ, kasmā brahmā nujju karoti lokaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sace hi so issaro sabbaloke, brahmā bahūbhūtapatībrahmapahū bhūtapatī pajānaṃ;
body.gathalast: Kiṃ sabbalokaṃ vidahī alakkhiṃ, kiṃ sabbalokaṃ na sukhiṃ akāsi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sace hi so issaro sabbaloke, brahmā bahūbhūtapatī pajānaṃ;
body.gathalast: Māyā musāvajjamadenamusāvañcanapadena cāpi, lokaṃ adhammena kimatthamakārikimattha’kāsikimattha’kāsikimatthakārī .
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sace hi so issaro sabbaloke, brahmā bahūbhūtapatī pajānaṃ;
body.gathalast: Adhammiko bhūtapatī ariṭṭha, dhamme sati yo vidahī adhammaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kīṭā paṭaṅgā uragā ca bhekābhiṅgā , hantvā kimī sujjhati makkhikā ca;
body.gathalast: Etepi dhammā anariyarūpā, kambojakānaṃ vitathā bahūnaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sace hi so sujjhati yo hanāti, hatopi so saggamupeti ṭhānaṃ;
body.gathalast: Bhovādi bhovādina mārayeyyuṃmārabheyyuṃ , ye cāpi tesaṃ abhisaddaheyyuṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Neva migā na pasū nopi gāvo, āyācanti attavadhāya keci;
body.gathalast: Vipphandamāne idha jīvikatthā, yaññesu pāṇe pasumārabhanti māharanti (sī. syā. pī.).
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yūpussaneyūpassa teyūpassa ne pasubandhe ca bālā, cittehi vaṇṇehi mukhaṃ nayanti;
body.gathalast: Ayaṃ te yūpo kāmaduho parattha, bhavissati sassato samparāye.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sace ca yūpe maṇisaṅkhamuttaṃ, dhaññaṃ dhanaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ;
body.gatha2: Sukkhesu kaṭṭhesu navesu cāpi, sace duhe tidive sabbakāme;
body.gathalast: Tevijjasaṅghāva puthū yajeyyuṃ, abrāhmaṇaṃ na brāhmaṇā (sī. syā.) kañci na yājayeyyuṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kuto ca yūpe maṇisaṅkhamuttaṃ, dhaññaṃ dhanaṃ rajataṃ jātarūpaṃ;
body.gathalast: Sukkhesu kaṭṭhesu navesu cāpi, kuto duhe tidive sabbakāme.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Saṭhā ca luddā ca paluddhabālāupaladdhabālāupaladdhabālā , cittehi vaṇṇehi mukhaṃ nayanti;
body.gathalast: Ādāya aggiṃ mama dehi vittaṃ, tato sukhī hohisi sabbakāme.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Tamaggihuttaṃ saraṇaṃ pavissa, cittehi vaṇṇehi mukhaṃ nayanti;
body.gathalast: Oropayitvā kesamassuṃ nakhañca, vedehi vittaṃ atigāḷhayantiatigāḷayantiatigāḷayanti .
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kākā ulūkaṃva raho labhitvā, ekaṃ samānaṃ bahukā samecca;
body.gathalast: Annāni bhutvā kuhakā kuhitvā, muṇḍaṃ karitvā yaññapathossajanti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Evañhi so vañcito brāhmaṇehi, eko samāno bahukābahuhī samecca;
body.gathalast: Te yogayogena vilumpamānā, diṭṭhaṃ adiṭṭhena dhanaṃ haranti.
Te tādisā corasamā asantā, vajjhā na haññanti ariṭṭha loke.
Taṃ cepi saccaṃ maghavā chinnabāhu, kenassa indo asure jināti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Tañceva tucchaṃ maghavā samaṅgī, hantā avajjho paramo sa devosudevosudevo ;
body.gathalast: Mantā ime brāhmaṇā tuccharūpā, sandiṭṭhikā vañcanā esa loke.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Mālāgiri himavā yo ca gijjho, sudassano nisabho kuveru;
body.gathalast: Ete ca aññe ca nagā mahantā, cityā katā yaññakarehi māhu.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yathāpakārāni hi iṭṭhakāni, cityā katā yaññakarehi māhu;
body.gathalast: Na pabbatā honti tathāpakārā, aññā disā acalā tiṭṭhaselā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Na iṭṭhakā honti silā cirenacirenapicirenapi , na tattha sañjāyati ayo na lohaṃ;
body.gathalast: Yaññañca etaṃ parivaṇṇayantā, cityā katā yaññakarehi māhu.
Tīre samuddassudakaṃ sajantaṃ, taṃ sāgarojjhohari tenapeyyo.
Na tena byāpannarasūdakā na, kasmā samuddo atulo apeyyo.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ye keci kūpā idha jīvaloke, loṇūdakā kūpakhaṇehi khātā;
body.gathalast: Na brāhmaṇajjhoharaṇenabrāhmaṇajjhohari tena tesu, āpo apeyyo dvirasaññu māhu.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Pure puratthā kā kassa bhariyā, mano manussaṃ ajanesi pubbe;
body.gathalast: Tenāpi dhammena na koci hīno, evampi vossaggavibhaṅgamāhuvossaggavibhāgamāhu .
body.gatha1: ‘‘Caṇḍālaputtopi adhicca vede, bhāseyya mante kusalo matīmāmutīmāmutīmā ;
body.gathalast: Na tassa muddhāpi phaleyya sattadhā, mantā ime attavadhāya katākattakatta .
Bālāna cittaṃ visame niviṭṭhaṃ, tadappapaññā abhisaddahanti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sīhassa byagghassa ca dīpino ca, na vijjatī porisiyaṃbalena;
body.gathalast: Manussabhāvo ca gavaṃva pekkho, jātī hi tesaṃ asamā samānāsamānaṃsamānaṃ .
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sace ca rājā pathaviṃ vijitvā, sajīvavā assavapārisajjo;
body.gathalast: Sayameva so sattusaṅghaṃ vijeyya, tassappajā niccasukhīniccasukhā bhaveyya.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Khattiyamantā ca tayo ca vedā, atthena ete samakā bhavanti;
body.gathalast: Tesañca atthaṃ avinicchinitvā, na bujjhatī oghapathaṃva channaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Khattiyamantā ca tayo ca vedā, atthena ete samakā bhavanti;
body.gathalast: Lābho alābho ayaso yaso ca, sabbeva tesaṃ catunnañcasabbe te sabbesaṃ catunnasabbe te sabbesaṃ catunna dhammā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yathāpi ibbhā dhanadhaññahetu, kammāni karontikārentikārentikārenti puthū pathabyā;
body.gathalast: Tevijjasaṅghā ca tatheva ajja, kammāni karontikārentikārentikārenti puthū pathabyā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ibbhehi ye teeteeteete samakā bhavanti, niccussukā kāmaguṇesu yuttā;
body.gathalast: Kammāni karontikārentikārentikārenti puthū pathabyā, tadappapaññā dvirasaññurā te’’.
Purato paṭipannāni, hāsayantā rathesabhaṃ.
Yuvā kalāpasannaddho, ko eti siriyā jalaṃ.
Mukhañca rucirā bhāti, ko eti siriyā jalaṃ.
Ādiccaraṃsāvaraṇaṃ, ko eti siriyā jalaṃ.
Ubhato varapuññassacarate varapaññassacarate varapaññassa , muddhani uparūpari.
Kañcanamaṇidaṇḍānitapaññamaṇidaṇḍānitapaññamaṇidaṇḍānisuvaṇṇamaṇidaṇḍānisuvaṇṇamaṇidaṇḍāni , caranti dubhato mukhaṃ.
Kassete kuṇḍalā vaggū, sobhanti dubhato mukhaṃ.
Sobhayanti nalāṭantaṃ, nabhā vijjurivuggatā.
Ko sobhati visālakkho, kassetaṃ uṇṇajaṃ mukhaṃ.
Bhāsamānassa sobhanti, dantā kuppilasādisā.
Ko so bimboṭṭhasampanno, divā sūriyova bhāsati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Himaccaye himavati hemavato (sī. syā. pī.), mahāsālova pupphito;
body.gathalast: Ko so odātapāvāro, jayaṃ indova sobhati.
Ko so parisamogayha, īsaṃ khaggaṃ pamuñcatiīso khaggaṃva muñcatiīso khaggaṃva muñcatibhante khaggaṃ pamuñcati .
Ko so omuñcate pādā, namo katvā mahesino’’.
Samuddajāya uppannā, nāgā ete mahiddhikā’’ti.
So pucchi brahmabandhuṃ, khaṇḍahālaṃ purohitaṃ mūḷhaṃ.
Yathā ito vajanti sugatiṃ, narā puññāni katvāna’.
Evaṃ vajanti sugatiṃ, narā puññāni katvāna’.
body.gatha1: ‘Kiṃ pana taṃ atidānaṃ, ke ca avajjhā imasmi lokasmiṃ;
body.gathalast: Etañca kho no akkhāhi, yajissāmi dadāmiyajissāma dadāmayajissāma dadāma dānāni’.
Usabhehi ājāniyehi catūhi, sabbacatukkena deva yajitabbaṃ’’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃ sutvā antepure, kumārā mahesiyo ca haññantu;
body.gathalast: Eko ahosi nigghoso, bhismā accuggato saddo’’.
Sūrañca vāmagottañca, pacurāpasurāpasurāpasurā kira hotha yaññatthāya.
Nandañcāpi kumāriṃ, pacurāpasurāpasurāpasurā kira hotha yaññatthāya.
Lakkhaṇavarūpapannā, pacurā kira hotha yaññatthāya.
Vaḍḍhañcāpi gahapatiṃ, pacurā kira hotha yaññatthāya’’.
Sabbeva sikhino deva karohi, atha vā no dāse sāvehi’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Abhayaṃkarampi me hatthiṃ, nāḷāgiriṃ accuggataṃ varuṇadantaṃnāḷāgiriṃ accutaṃ varuṇadantaṃrājagiriṃ accutavaruṇadantaṃ ;
body.gathalast: Ānetha kho ne khippaṃ, yaññatthāya bhavissanti.
Ānetha kho ne khippaṃ, yaññatthāya bhavissanti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Usabhampiusabhampi me yūthapatiṃ anojaṃ, nisabhaṃ gavampatiṃ tepi mayhaṃ ānetha;
body.gathalast: Samūhasamupāsamupāsammukhā karontu sabbaṃ, yajissāmi dadāmi dānāni.
Āṇāpetha ca kumāreāṇāpetha candakumāreāṇāpetha candakumāre , abhiramantu imaṃ rattiṃ.
Vadetha dāni kumāre, ajja kho vo (pī.) pacchimā ratti’’.
Yañño kira te putta, bhavissati catūhi puttehi’’.
Puttehi yaññaṃ yajitvāna, sugatiṃ saggaṃ gamissāmi’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Mā taṃ mā (sī. pī.) putta saddahesi, sugati kira hoti puttayaññena;
body.gathalast: Nirayāneso maggo, neso maggo hi saggānaṃ.
Esa maggo sugatiyā, na ca maggo puttayaññena’’.
Puttehi yaññaṃ puttehi (sī. syā. pī.) yajitvāna duccajehi, sugatiṃ saggaṃ gamissāmi’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃtaṃ pitāpi avaca, vasavattī orasaṃ sakaṃ puttaṃ;
body.gathalast: Yañño kira te putta, bhavissati catūhi puttehi’’.
Puttehi yaññaṃ yajitvāna, sugatiṃ saggaṃ gamissāmi’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Mā taṃ putta saddahesi, sugati kira hoti puttayaññena;
body.gathalast: Nirayāneso maggo, neso maggo hi saggānaṃ.
Esa maggo sugatiyā, na ca maggo puttayaññena’’.
Puttehi yaññaṃ yajitvāna duccajehi, sugatiṃ saggaṃ gamissāmi’’.
Puttaparivuto tuvaṃ, raṭṭhaṃ janapadañca pālehi’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Mā no deva avadhi, dāse no dehi khaṇḍahālassa;
body.gathalast: Api nigaḷabandhakāpi, hatthī asse ca pālema.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Mā no deva avadhi, dāse no dehi khaṇḍahālassa;
body.gathalast: Api nigaḷabandhakāpi, hatthichakaṇāni ujjhema.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Mā no deva avadhi, dāse no dehi khaṇḍahālassa;
body.gathalast: Api nigaḷabandhakāpi, assachakaṇāni ujjhema.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Mā no deva avadhi, dāse no dehi khaṇḍahālassa idaṃ padaṃ sī. pī. potthakesu natthi;
body.gatha2: Yassa honti tava kāmā, api raṭṭhā pabbājitā;
body.gathalast: Bhikkhācariyaṃ carissāma’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Dukkhaṃ kho me janayatha, vilapantā jīvitassa kāmā hi;
body.gathalast: Muñcethamuñcathamuñcatha dāni kumāre, alampi me hotu puttayaññena’’.
Atha no upakkhaṭassa yaññassa, kasmā karosi vikkhepaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sabbe vajanti sugatiṃ, ye yajanti yepi yājenti;
body.gathalast: Ye cāpi anumodanti, yajantānaṃ edisaṃ mahāyaññaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Atha kissa janoca noca noca no pubbe, sotthānaṃ brāhmaṇe avācesi;
body.gathalast: Atha no akāraṇasmā, yaññatthāya deva ghātesi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Pubbeva no daharakāledaharake samānedaharake samāne , na hanesina māresina māresi na ghātesi;
body.gathalast: Daharamhā yobbanaṃ pattā, adūsakā tāta haññāma.
Yuddhe vā yujjhamāne vā, na hi mādisā sūrā honti yaññatthāya.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Paccante vāpi kupite, aṭavīsu vā mādise niyojenti;
body.gathalast: Atha no akāraṇasmā, abhūmiyaṃ tāta haññāma.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yāpi hi tā sakuṇiyo, vasanti tiṇagharāni katvāna;
body.gathalast: Tāsampi piyā puttā, atha no tvaṃ deva ghātesi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Mā tassa saddahesi, na maṃ khaṇḍahālo ghāteyya;
body.gathalast: Mamañhi so ghātetvāna, anantarā tampi deva ghāteyya.
Athaggapiṇḍikāpi, kule kule hete bhuñjanti.
Yebhuyyena ete, akataññuno brāhmaṇā deva.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Mā no deva avadhi, dāse no dehi khaṇḍahālassa;
body.gathalast: Api nigaḷabandhakāpi, hatthī asse ca pālema.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Mā no deva avadhi, dāse no dehi khaṇḍahālassa;
body.gathalast: Api nigaḷabandhakāpi, hatthichakaṇāni ujjhema.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Mā no deva avadhi, dāse no dehi khaṇḍahālassa;
body.gathalast: Api nigaḷabandhakāpi, assachakaṇāni ujjhema.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Mā no deva avadhi, dāse no dehi khaṇḍahālassa;
body.gatha2: Yassa honti tava kāmā, api raṭṭhā pabbājitā;
body.gathalast: Bhikkhācariyaṃ carissāma’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Dukkhaṃ kho me janayatha, vilapantā jīvitassa kāmā hi;
body.gathalast: Muñcetha dāni kumāre, alampi me hotu puttayaññena’’.
Atha no upakkhaṭassa yaññassa, kasmā karosi vikkhepaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sabbe vajanti sugatiṃ, ye yajanti yepi yājenti;
body.gathalast: Ye cāpi anumodanti, yajantānaṃ edisaṃ mahāyaññaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yadi kira yajitvā puttehi, devalokaṃ ito cutā yanti;
body.gathalast: Brāhmaṇo tāva yajatu, pacchāpi yajasi tuvaṃ rājā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yadi kira yajitvā puttehi, devalokaṃ ito cutā yanti;
body.gathalast: Esveva khaṇḍahālo, yajataṃ sakehi puttehi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Evaṃ jānanto khaṇḍahālo, kiṃ puttake na ghātesi;
body.gathalast: Sabbañca ñātijanaṃ, attānañca na ghātesi.

body.gatha2: Natthi balaṃ vīriyaṃ vā, kuto uṭṭhānaporisaṃ;
body.gathalast: Niyatāni hi bhūtāni, yathā goṭaviso tathā.
Natthi dānaphalaṃ deva, avaso devavīriyo.
Avasā denti dhīrānaṃ, bālā paṇḍitamānino.
body.gatha2: Tejo pathavī āpo ca, vāyo sukhaṃ dukhañcime;
body.gathalast: Jīve ca sattime kāyā, yesaṃ chettā na vijjati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Natthi hantā va chettā vā, haññe yevāpihaññare vāpihaññare vāpihaññare vāpi koci naṃ;
body.gathalast: Antareneva kāyānaṃ, satthāni vītivattare.
body.gatha1: ‘‘‘Yo yopāyaṃyopāyaṃcāpiyo cāyaṃyo cāyaṃ siramādāya, paresaṃ nisitāsinā;
body.gathalast: Na so chindati te kāye, tattha pāpaphalaṃ kuto.
Anāgate tamhi kāle, saññatopi na sujjhati.
Pāpañcepi bahuṃ katvā, taṃ khaṇaṃ nātivattare.
Niyatiṃ nātivattāma, velantamiva sāgaro’’’.
‘‘Yathā bhadanto bhaṇati, mayhampetaṃva ruccati.
Piṅgalo nāmahaṃ āsiṃ, luddo goghātako pure.
Bahū mayā hatā pāṇā, mahiṃsā sūkarā ajā.
Natthi nūna phalaṃ pāpaṃ, yohaṃpāpe sohaṃpāpe sohaṃ na nirayaṃ gato.
body.gatha1: Athettha bījako nāma, dāso āsi paṭaccarīpaḷaccarīpaḷaccarīpaṭajjarī ;
body.gathalast: Uposathaṃ upavasanto, guṇasantikupāgami.
body.gatha1: Kassapassa vaco sutvā, alātassa ca bhāsitaṃ;
body.gathalast: Passasanto muhuṃ uṇhaṃ, rudaṃ assūni vattayi.
Kiṃ te sutaṃ vā diṭṭhaṃ vā, kiṃ maṃ vedesi vedanaṃ’’.
‘‘Natthi me vedanā dukkhā, mahārāja suṇohi me.
Sāketāhaṃ pure āsiṃ, bhāvaseṭṭhi guṇe rato.
Na cāpi pāpakaṃ kammaṃ, sarāmi katamattano.
Gabbhamhi kumbhadāsiyā, yato jāto suduggato.
Upaḍḍhabhāgaṃ bhattassa, dadāmi yo me icchati.
Na cāpi na ahaṃ (ka.) bhūte hiṃsāmi, theyyañcāpi vivajjayiṃ.
Niratthaṃ maññidaṃ sīlaṃ, alāto bhāsatī yathā.
Kaṭaṃ alāto gaṇhāti, kitavosikkhito yathā.
Tasmā rāja parodāmi, sutvā kassapabhāsitaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: Bījakassa vaco sutvā, rājā aṅgati mabravi;
body.gathalast: ‘‘Natthi dvāraṃ sugatiyā, niyatiṃniyataṃ kaṅkha bījaka.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sukhaṃ vā yadi vā dukkhaṃ, niyatiyā kira labbhati;
body.gathalast: Saṃsārasuddhi sabbesaṃ, mā turitthoturito anāgate.
Vohāramanusāsanto , ratihīno tadantarā’’.
Idaṃ vatvāna vedeho, paccagā sanivesanaṃ.
Amacce sannipātetvā, idaṃ vacanamabravi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Candake me vimānasmiṃ, sadā kāme vidhentu me;
body.gathalast: Mā upagacchuṃ atthesu, guyhappakāsiyesu ca.
Ete atthe nisīdantu, vohārakusalā tayo’’.
Na cāpi brāhmaṇibbhesu, atthe kismiñci byāvaṭo.
Rājakaññā rucārujārujā nāma, dhātimātaramabravi.
body.gatha1: ‘Alaṅkarotha maṃ khippaṃ, sakhiyo cālaṅkarontuca karontuca karontu me;
body.gathalast: Suve pannaraso dibyo, gacchaṃ issarasantike’ pitussa santike (syā.).
Maṇisaṅkhamuttāratanaṃ, nānāratte ca ambare.
Parikiriya pasobhiṃsuasobhiṃsuasobhiṃsuasobhiṃsu , rucaṃ ruciravaṇṇiniṃ.
Sateratā abbhamiva, candakaṃ pāvisī rucā.
Suvaṇṇakhacitesuvaṇṇavikatesuvaṇṇavikate pīṭhe, ekamantaṃ upāvisi’’.
Rucaṃ sakhimajjhagataṃ, idaṃ vacanamabravi.
Kacci bahuvidhaṃ khajjaṃ, sadā abhiharanti te.
Gharake karotha paccekaṃ, khiḍḍāratiratā muhuṃ ahu (syā. ka.).
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kena vā vikalaṃ tuyhaṃ, kiṃ khippaṃ āharantu te;
body.gathalast: Manokarassu kuḍḍamukhīkuṭṭamukhīkuṭṭamukhī , api candasamamhipi’’api candasamampi te .
‘‘Sabbametaṃ mahārāja, labbhatissarasantike.
Yathādinnañca dassāmi, dānaṃ sabbavanīsvahaṃsabbavaṇīsvahaṃsabbavaṇīsvahaṃ’’ .
body.gatha1: Rucāya vacanaṃ sutvā, rājā aṅgati mabravi;
body.gathalast: ‘‘Bahuṃ vināsitaṃ vittaṃ, niratthaṃ aphalaṃ tayā.
Niyatetaṃ abhuttabbaṃ, natthi puññaṃ abhuñjato’’.
Passasanto muhuṃ uṇhaṃ, rudaṃ assūni vattayi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yāva ruce jīvamānā jīvasino (sī. pī.), mā bhattamapanāmayi;
body.gathalast: Natthi bhadde paro loko, kiṃ niratthaṃ vihaññasi’’.
Jānaṃ pubbāparaṃ dhammaṃ, pitaraṃ etadabravi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sutameva pure āsi, sakkhi paccakkhaṃ (ka.) diṭṭhamidaṃ mayā;
body.gathalast: Bālūpasevī yo hoti, bālova samapajjatha.
Patirūpaṃ alātena, bījakena ca muyhituṃ.
Kathaṃ bālehi sadisaṃ, hīnadiṭṭhiṃ upāgami.
Kīṭova aggiṃ jalitaṃ apāpataṃ, upapajjati mohamūḷhomomuhomomuho naggabhāvaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Saṃsārasuddhīti pure niviṭṭhā, kammaṃ vidūsenti bahū ajānaṃ bahū pajā (ka.);
body.gathalast: Pubbe kalī atthoduggahitovaatthāduggahitova’natthā , dummo ca yā balisā ambujova.
Upamāya midhekacce, atthaṃ jānanti paṇḍitā.
Atibhāraṃ samādāya, aṇṇave avasīdati.
Atibhāraṃ samādāya, niraye avasīdati.
Ācināti ca taṃ pāpaṃ, yena gacchati duggatiṃ.
Tasseva deva nissando, yañceso labhate sukhaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Khīyate cassa taṃ puññaṃ, tathā hi aguṇe rato;
body.gathalast: Ujumaggaṃ avahāyaapāhāya , kummaggamanudhāvati.
Unnameti tulāsīsaṃ, bhāre oropite sati.
Saggātimāno dāsova, bījako sātavesādhave rato.
Pubbevassapubbe tassapubbe tassa kataṃ pāpaṃ, tameso paṭisevati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Khīyate cassa taṃ pāpaṃ, tathā hi vinaye rato;
body.gathalast: Kassapañca samāpajja, mā hevuppathamāgamā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yaṃ yañhi rāja bhajati, santaṃ vā yadi vā asaṃ;
body.gathalast: Sīlavantaṃ visīlaṃ vā, vasaṃ tasseva gacchati.
Sopi tādisako hoti, sahavāso hi sahavāsopi (ka.) tādiso.
Upalepabhayāupalimpabhayā dhīro, neva pāpasakhā siyā.
Kusāpi pūti vāyanti, evaṃ bālūpasevanā.
Pattāpi surabhi vāyanti, evaṃ dhīrūpasevanā.
Asanto nirayaṃ nenti, santo pāpenti suggatiṃ’’.
Anāgatāpi satteva, yā gamissaṃ ito cutā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yā me sā sattamī jāti, ahu pubbe janādhipa;
body.gathalast: Kammāraputto magadhesu, ahuṃ rājagahe pure.
Paradārassa heṭhento, carimhā amarā viya.
Atha aññehi kammehi, ajāyiṃ vaṃsabhūmiyaṃ.
Ekaputto mahārāja, niccaṃ sakkatapūjito.
Paṇḍitaṃ sutasampannaṃ, so maṃ atthe nivesayi.
Taṃ kammaṃ nihitaṃ aṭṭhā, nidhīva udakantike.
Phalaṃ pariyāga maṃpariyāga taṃpariyāgataṃpariyāgataṃ pacchā, bhutvā duṭṭhavisaṃ yathā.
Sakammunā apaccissaṃ, taṃ saraṃ na sukhaṃ labhe.
Bhinnāgatebheṇṇākaṭebheṇṇākaṭe ahuṃ rāja, chagalo uddhatapphalochakalo uddhitapphalochakalo uddhitapphalo .
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sātaputtā mayā vūḷhā, piṭṭhiyā ca rathena ca;
body.gathalast: Tassa kammassa nissando, paradāragamanassa me.
Tassa kammassa nissando, paradāragamanassa me.
body.gatha2: Niluñcito javo bhadro, yoggaṃ vūḷhaṃ ciraṃ mayā;
body.gathalast: Tassa kammassa nissando, paradāragamanassa me.
body.gatha2: Nevitthī na pumā āsiṃ, manussatte sudullabhe;
body.gathalast: Tassa kammassa nissando, paradāragamanassa me.
Bhavane tāvatiṃsāhaṃ, accharā kāmavaṇṇinīvaravaṇṇinī .
Kusalā naccagītassa, sakkassa paricārikā.
Anāgatāpi satteva, yā gamissaṃ ito cutā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Pariyāgataṃ taṃ kusalaṃ, yaṃ me kosambiyaṃ kataṃ;
body.gathalast: Deve ceva manusse ca, sandhāvissaṃ ito cutā.
Thībhāvāpi na muccissaṃ, chaṭṭhā nigatiyochaṭṭhā gatiyo imā.
Pumā devo bhavissāmibhavissati , devakāyasmimuttamo.
Devaputto javo nāma, yo me mālaṃ paṭicchati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Muhutto viya so dibyo, idha vassāni soḷasa;
body.gathalast: Rattindivo ca so dibyo, mānusiṃ saradosataṃ.
Kalyāṇaṃ yadi vā pāpaṃ, na hi kammaṃ vinassatipanassatipanassati .
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yo icche puriso hotuṃ, jātiṃ jātiṃjātijātiṃjātijātiṃ punappunaṃ;
body.gathalast: Paradāraṃ vivajjeyya, dhotapādova kaddamaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yā icche puriso hotuṃ, jātiṃ jātiṃ punappunaṃ;
body.gathalast: Sāmikaṃ apacāyeyya, indaṃva paricārikā.
Pāpāni parivajjetvāparivajjeyya , tividhaṃ dhammamācare.
Attano hoti atthāya, itthī vā yadi vā pumā.
Asaṃsayaṃ tehi pure suciṇṇaṃ, kammassakāse puthu sabbasattā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Iṅghānucintesi sayampi deva, kutonidānā te imā janinda;
body.gathalast: Yā te imā accharāsannikāsā, alaṅkatā kañcanajālachannā’’.
body.gatha1: Iccevaṃ pitaraṃ kaññā, rucā tosesi aṅgatiṃ;
body.gathalast: Mūḷhassa maggamācikkhi, dhammamakkhāsi subbatā.
Jambudīpaṃ avekkhanto, addā rājānamaṅgatiṃ.
Tañca disvānānuppattaṃ, rucā isimavandatha.
Nāradaṃ paripucchanto, idaṃ vacanamabravi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kuto nu āgacchasi devavaṇṇi, obhāsayaṃ sabbadisā saṃvariṃ (sī. pī.) candimāva;
body.gathalast: Akkhāhi me pucchito nāmagottaṃ, kathaṃ taṃ jānanti manussaloke’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ahañhi devato idāni emi, obhāsayaṃ sabbadisā saṃvariṃ (sī. pī.) candimāva;
body.gathalast: Akkhāmi te pucchito nāmagottaṃ, jānanti maṃ nārado kassapo ca’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Accherarūpaṃ tava vata (sī. pī.) yādisañca, vehāyasaṃ gacchasi tiṭṭhasī ca;
body.gathalast: Pucchāmi taṃ nārada etamatthaṃ, atha kena vaṇṇena tavāyamiddhi’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Saccañca dhammo ca damo ca cāgo, guṇā mamete pakatā purāṇā;
body.gathalast: Teheva dhammehi susevitehi, manojavo yena kāmaṃ gatosmi’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Accheramācikkhasi puññasiddhiṃ, sace hi etehi ete tvaṃ (sī. pī.) yathā vadesi;
body.gathalast: Pucchāmi taṃ nārada etamatthaṃ, puṭṭho ca me sādhu viyākarohi’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Pucchassu maṃ rāja tavesa attho, yaṃ saṃsayaṃ kuruse bhūmipāla;
body.gathalast: Ahaṃ taṃ nissaṃsayataṃ gamemi, nayehi ñāyehi ca hetubhī ca’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Pucchāmi taṃ nārada etamatthaṃ, puṭṭho ca me nārada mā musā bhaṇi;
body.gathalast: Atthi nu devā pitaro nu atthi, loko paro atthi jano yamāhu’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Attheva devā pitaro ca atthi, loko paro atthi jano yamāhu;
body.gathalast: Kāmesu giddhā ca narā pamūḷhā, lokaṃ paraṃ na vidū mohayuttā’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Atthīti ce nārada saddahāsi, nivesanaṃ paraloke matānaṃ;
body.gathalast: Idheva me pañca satāni dehi, dassāmi te paraloke sahassaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Dajjemu kho pañca satāni bhoto, jaññāmu ce sīlavantaṃ vadaññuṃvataññuṃ ;
body.gathalast: Luddaṃ taṃ bhontaṃ niraye vasantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Idheva yo hoti adhammasīloakammasīlo , pāpācāro alaso luddakammo;
body.gathalast: Na paṇḍitā tasmiṃ iṇaṃ dadanti, na hi āgamo hoti tathāvidhamhā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Dakkhañca posaṃ manujā viditvā, uṭṭhānakaṃuṭṭhāhakaṃ sīlavantaṃ vadaññuṃ;
body.gathalast: Sayameva bhogehi nimantayanti, kammaṃ karitvā puna māharesi’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ito cuto gato (sī. pī.) dakkhasi tattha rāja, kākolasaṅghehi vikassamānaṃkākoḷasaṅghehipi kaḍḍhamānaṃkākoḷasaṅghehipi kaḍḍhamānaṃ ;
body.gatha2: Taṃ khajjamānaṃ niraye vasantaṃ, kākehi gijjhehi ca senakehisoṇakehisoṇakehi ;
body.gathalast: Sañchinnagattaṃ ruhiraṃ savantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Andhaṃtamaṃ tattha na candasūriyā, nirayo sadā tumulo ghorarūpo;
body.gathalast: Sā neva rattī na divā paññāyati, tathāvidhe ko vicare dhanatthiko.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sabalo ca sāmo ca duve suvānā, pavaddhakāyā balino mahantā;
body.gathalast: Khādanti dantehi ayomayehi, ito paṇunnaṃ paralokapattaṃparaloke patantaṃ .
body.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃ khajjamānaṃ niraye vasantaṃ, luddehi vāḷehi aghammigehi ca;
body.gathalast: Sañchinnagattaṃ ruhiraṃ savantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Usūhi sattīhi ca sunisitāhi, hananti vijjhanti ca paccamittā pothayanti (ka.);
body.gathalast: Kāḷūpakāḷā nirayamhi ghore, pubbe naraṃ dukkaṭakammakāriṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃ haññamānaṃ niraye vajantaṃ, kucchismiṃ passasmiṃ vipphālitūdaraṃ;
body.gathalast: Sañchinnagattaṃ ruhiraṃ savantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sattī usū tomarabhiṇḍivālā, vividhāvudhā vassanti tattha devā;
body.gathalast: Patanti aṅgāramivaccimanto, silāsanī vassati luddakamme.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Uṇho ca vāto nirayamhi dussaho, na tamhi sukhaṃ labbhati seti (ka.) ittarampi;
body.gathalast: Taṃ taṃ vidhāvantamalenamāturaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sandhāvamānampisandhāvamānaṃ taṃsandhāvamānaṃ taṃ rathesu yuttaṃ, sajotibhūtaṃ pathaviṃ kamantaṃ;
body.gathalast: Patodalaṭṭhīhi sucodayantaṃsucodiyantaṃsucodiyantaṃ , ko codaye paraloke sahassaṃ.
Sañchinnagattaṃ ruhiraṃ savantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassaṃ.
Sudaḍḍhagattaṃ kapaṇaṃ rudantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassaṃ.
Ayomayehi tikkhehi, naralohitapāyibhi.
Coditā sattihatthehi, yamaniddesakāribhi.
Vidaḍḍhakāyaṃviduṭṭhakāyaṃ vitacaṃ, āturaṃ gāḷhavedanaṃ.
Dumagge vitacaṃ gattaṃdumaggaviṭapaggataṃ , ko taṃ yāceyya taṃ dhanaṃ.
Ayomayehi tikkhehi, naralohitapāyibhi.
Sañchinnagattaṃ ruhiraṃ savantaṃ, ko codaye paraloke sahassaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Tato nikkhantamattaṃ taṃ, asipattācitā dumāasipattanirayā dukhāasipattanirayā dukhā ;
body.gathalast: Sampatitaṃ vetaraṇiṃ, ko taṃ yāceyya taṃ dhanaṃ.
Ayopokkharasañchannā, tikkhā pattehi sandati.
Vetaraññe anālambe, ko taṃ yāceyya taṃ dhanaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Vedhāmi rukkho viya chijjamāno, disaṃ na jānāmi pamūḷhasañño;
body.gathalast: Bhayānutappāmi mahā ca me bhayā, sutvāna kathāgāthāgāthāgāthā tava bhāsitā ise.
Andhakāreva pajjoto, tvaṃ nosi saraṇaṃ ise.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Atthañca dhammaṃ anusāsa maṃ ise, atītamaddhā aparādhitaṃ mayā;
body.gathalast: Ācikkha me nārada suddhimaggaṃ, yathā ahaṃ no nirayaṃ pateyyaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yathā ahu dhataraṭṭho ( ) ettha kiñci ūnaṃ viya dissati, vessāmitto aṭṭhako yāmataggi;
body.gathalast: Usindaro cāpi sivī ca rājā, paricārakā samaṇabrāhmaṇānaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ete caññe ca rājāno, ye saggavisayaṃsakkavisayaṃsakkavisayaṃ gatā;
body.gathalast: Adhammaṃ parivajjetvā, dhammaṃ cara mahīpati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Annahatthā ca te byamhe, ghosayantu pure tava;
body.gatha2: Ko chāto ko ca tasito, ko mālaṃ ko vilepanaṃ;
body.gathalast: Nānārattānaṃ vatthānaṃ, ko naggo paridahissati.
Iti sāyañca pāto ca, ghosayantu pure tava.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Jiṇṇaṃ posaṃ gavassañca, māssu yuñja yathā pure;
body.gathalast: Parihārañca dajjāsi, adhikārakato balī.
Avihiṃsāsāritakkho, saṃvibhāgapaṭicchado.
Kucchisaññamanabbhanto, vācāsaññamakūjano.
Girāsakhilanelaṅgo, mitabhāṇisilesito.
Athaddhatānatīsākoatthaddhatānatīsākoatthaddhatānatīsāko , sīlasaṃvaranandhano.
Bāhusaccamapālambo, ṭhitacittamupādhiyodhiticittamupādhiyo .
Nivātavuttiyottakonivātavuttiyottaṅgo , anatimānayugo lahu.
Sati patodo dhīrassa, dhiti yogo ca rasmiyo.
Icchā lobho ca kummaggo, ujumaggo ca saṃyamo.
Paññā ākoṭanī rāja, tattha attāva sārathi.
Sabbakāmaduho rāja, na jātu nirayaṃ vaje’’.
Vijayo sāriputtosi, moggallānosi bījako.
Ānando sā rucā āsi, yā rājānaṃ pasādayi.
Mahābrahmā bodhisatto, evaṃ dhāretha jātaka’’nti.
Vimale akkhāhi pucchitā, kīdisī tuyhaṃ sarīravedanā’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Dhammo manujesu mātīnaṃmātinaṃmātinaṃ , dohaḷo nāma janinda vuccati;
body.gathalast: Dhammāhataṃ nāgakuñjara, vidhurassa hadayābhipatthaye’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Candaṃ kho tvaṃ dohaḷāyasi, sūriyaṃ vā atha vāpi mālutaṃ;
body.gathalast: Dullabhañhidullabhedullabhe vidhurassa dassanaṃdassanedassane , ko vidhuramidha mānayissati’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kinnu tāta tuvaṃ pajjhāyasi, padumaṃ hatthagataṃva te mukhaṃ;
body.gathalast: Kinnu dummanarūposi issara, mā tvaṃ soci amittatāpana’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Mātā hi tava irandhatiirandatiirandatiirandati , vidhurassa hadayaṃ dhaniyati;
body.gathalast: Dullabhañhi vidhurassa dassanaṃ, ko vidhuramidha mānayissati’’.
‘‘Pituno ca sā sutvāna vākyaṃ, rattiṃ nikkhamma avassutiṃ cari’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ke gandhabbe rakkhase ca nāge, ke kimpurise cāpi mānuse;
body.gathalast: Ke paṇḍite sabbakāmadadesabbakāmadesabbakāmade , dīgharattaṃ bhattā me bhavissati’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Assāsa hessāmi te pati, bhattā te hessāmi anindalocane;
body.gathalast: Paññā hi mamaṃ tathāvidhā, assāsa hessasi bhariyā mama.
Ehi gacchāma pitu mamantikepitu mama santikaṃ , esova te etamatthaṃ pavakkhati.
Yakkhaṃ hatthe gahetvāna, pitusantikupāgami’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Nāgavara vaco suṇohi me, patirūpaṃ paṭipajja suṅkiyaṃ;
body.gathalast: Patthemi ahaṃ irandhatiṃ, tāya samaṅgiṃ karohi maṃ tuvaṃ.
Te nāga paṭipajjassu, dhītaraṃ dehirandhatiṃ’’.
Anāmanta kataṃ kammaṃ, taṃ pacchā anutappati’’.
body.gatha1: Tato so varuṇo nāgo, pavisitvā nivesanaṃ;
body.gathalast: Bhariyaṃ āmantayitvāna, idaṃ vacanamabravi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ayaṃ so puṇṇako yakkho, yācatī maṃ irandhatiṃ;
body.gathalast: Bahunā vittalābhena, tassa dema piyaṃ mamaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Na dhanena na vittena, labbhā amhaṃ irandhatī;
body.gatha2: Sace ca kho hadayaṃ paṇḍitassa, dhammena laddhā idha māhareyya;
body.gathalast: Etena vittena kumāri labbhā, nāññaṃ dhanaṃ uttari patthayāma’’.
body.gatha1: Tato so varuṇo nāgo, nikkhamitvā nivesanā;
body.gathalast: Puṇṇakāmantayitvāna, idaṃ vacanamabravi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Na dhanena na vittena, labbhā amhaṃ irandhatī;
body.gatha2: Sace tuvaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍitassa, dhammena laddhā idha māharesi;
body.gathalast: Etena vittena kumāri labbhā, nāññaṃ dhanaṃ uttari patthayāma’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yaṃ paṇḍitotyeke vadanti loke, tameva bāloti punāhu aññe;
body.gathalast: Akkhāhi me vippavadanti ettha, kaṃ paṇḍitaṃ nāga tuvaṃ vadesi’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Korabyarājassa dhanañcayassadhanañjayassadhanañjayassadhanañjayassa , yadi te suto vidhuro nāma kattā;
body.gathalast: Ānehi taṃ paṇḍitaṃ dhammaladdhā, irandhatī padacarāpaddhacarāpaddhacarāpaṭṭhacarāpaṭṭhacarā te hotu.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Idañca sutvā varuṇassa vākyaṃ, uṭṭhāya yakkho paramappatīto;
body.gathalast: Tattheva santo purisaṃ asaṃsi, ānehi ājaññamidheva yuttaṃ.
Jambonadassa pākassa, suvaṇṇassa uracchado’’.
Alaṅkato kappitakesamassu, pakkāmi vehāyasamantalikkhe antalikkhaṃ (ka.).
body.gatha1: ‘‘So puṇṇako kāmarāgenakāmavegenakāmavegena giddho, irandhatiṃ nāgakaññaṃ jigīsaṃjigiṃsaṃjigiṃsaṃjigiṃsaṃ ;
body.gathalast: Gantvāna taṃ bhūtapatiṃ yasassiṃ, iccabravī vessavaṇaṃ kuveraṃ.
Nagare nimmite kañcanamaye, maṇḍalassa uragassa niṭṭhitaṃ.
Pāsādettha silāmayā, sovaṇṇaratanehi chāditā.
Piyaṅgupiyakāpiyakāpiyaṅgukā uddālakā sahā, uparibhaddakā sinduvārakā bhinduvāritā (syā. pī.), bhindhavāritā (ka.).
Ete dumā pariṇāmitā, sobhayanti uragassa mandiraṃmandiremandire .
Yattha vasato papātiko, nāgarājā varuṇo mahiddhiko.
Kālā taruṇāva uggatā, pucimandatthanī cārudassanā.
Tidivokacarāva accharā, vijjuvabbhaghanā vinissaṭā.
Taṃ tesaṃ demi issara, tena te denti irandhatiṃ mamaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘So puṇṇako bhūtapatiṃ yasassiṃ, āmantaya vessavaṇaṃ kuveraṃ;
body.gathalast: Tattheva santosantaṃ purisaṃ asaṃsi, ānehi ājaññamidheva yuttaṃ.
Jambonadassa pākassa, suvaṇṇassa uracchado.
Alaṅkato kappitakesamassu, pakkāmi vehāyasamantalikkhe’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘So aggamā rājagahaṃ surammaṃ, aṅgassa rañño nagaraṃ durāyutaṃdurāsadaṃ ;
body.gathalast: Pahūtabhakkhaṃ bahuannapānaṃ, masakkasāraṃ viya vāsavassa.
Nānāsakuntābhirudaṃ suvaṅgaṇaṃsubhaṅgaṇaṃsubhaṅgaṇaṃ , pupphābhikiṇṇaṃ himavaṃva pabbataṃ.
Anvesamāno maṇiratanaṃ uḷāraṃ, tamaddasā pabbatakūṭamajjhe.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Disvā maṇiṃ pabhassaraṃ jātimantaṃjātivantaṃjātivantaṃ , manoharaṃdhanāharaṃdhanāharaṃdhanāharaṃ maṇiratanaṃ uḷāraṃ;
body.gathalast: Daddallamānaṃ yasasā yasassinaṃ, obhāsatī vijjurivantalikkhe.
Ājaññamāruyha manomavaṇṇo, pakkāmi vehāyasamantalikkhe.
Samāgate ekasataṃ samagge, avhettha yakkho avikampamāno.
Kamanuttaraṃ ratanavaraṃ jināma, ko vāpi no jeti varaddhanena’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kuhiṃ nu raṭṭhe tava jātibhūmi, na korabyasseva vaco tavedaṃ;
body.gathalast: Abhītosiabhibhosiabhibhosi no vaṇṇanibhāya sabbe, akkhāhi me nāmañca bandhave ca’’.
Aṅgesu me ñātayo bandhavā ca, akkhena devasmi idhānupatto’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kiṃ māṇavassa ratanāni atthi, ye taṃ jinanto hare akkhadhutto;
body.gathalast: Bahūni rañño ratanāni atthi, te tvaṃ daliddo kathamavhayesi’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Manoharo nāma maṇī mamāyaṃ, manoharaṃ maṇiratanaṃ uḷāraṃ;
body.gathalast: Imañca ājaññamamittatāpanaṃ, etaṃ me jinitvā hare akkhadhutto’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Eko maṇī māṇava kiṃ karissati, ājāniyeko pana kiṃ karissati;
body.gathalast: Bahūni rañño maṇiratanāni atthi, ājāniyā vātajavā anappakā’’.
Itthīnaṃ viggahā cettha, purisānañca viggahā.
Nāgarājā supaṇṇā canāgarāje supaṇṇe canāgarāje supaṇṇe canāgarāje supaṇṇe ca , maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Hatthānīkaṃ rathānīkaṃ, asse pattī ca vammine dhajāni ca (pī.);
body.gathalast: Caturaṅginimaṃ senaṃ, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
Balaggāni viyūḷhāniviyūhāniviyūhāni , maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
Siṅghāṭakesu bhūmiyo, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
Aṭṭālake ca dvāre ca, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
Haṃsā koñcā mayūrā ca, cakkavākā ca kukkuhā.
Nānādijagaṇākiṇṇaṃ, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
Samussitadhajaṃ rammaṃ, soṇṇavālukasanthataṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Passettha passa tvaṃ (sī. pī.) paṇṇasālāyo, vibhattā bhāgaso mitā;
body.gathalast: Nivesane nivese ca, sandhibyūhe pathaddhiyo.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Pānāgāre ca soṇḍe ca, sūnāsūṇāsūṇāsuddāsuddā odaniyā gharā;
body.gathalast: Vesī ca gaṇikāyo ca, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
Suvaṇṇakāre maṇikāre, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
Pāṇissare kumbhathūnike, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
Sabbañca tāḷāvacaraṃ, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
Tūriyatāḷitasaṅghuṭṭhaṃ , maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
Vetālikevettalike ca jalle ca, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
Mañcātimañce bhūmiyo, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
Nihate nihatamāne ca, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
Sīhā byagghā varāhā ca, acchakokataracchayo.
Eṇeyyā ca varāhā sarabhā (syā.) ca, gaṇino nīkaniṅkaniṅkaniṅka sūkarā.
Nānāmigagaṇākiṇṇaṃ, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
Acchā savanti ambūni, macchagumbanisevitā.
Pāṭhīnā pāvusā macchā, balajāvalajāvālajā muñjarohitā.
Veḷuriyaka-rodāyoveḷuriyaphalakarodāyo , maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
Nānādijagaṇākiṇṇā, puthulomanisevitā.
Upetaṃ vanarājehi, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
Kuruyo jambudīpañca, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
Sineruṃ anupariyante, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
Cattāro ca mahārāje, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
Ramme kimpurisākiṇṇe, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
Vejayantañca pāsādaṃ, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
Erāvaṇaṃ nāgarājaṃ, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
Nandane vicarantiyo, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
Devaputte ramamānecaramānecaramāne , maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
Pajjalante ca pajjalantena (sī. syā. pī.) vaṇṇena, maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Tāvatiṃse ca yāme ca, tusite cāpi nimmite;
body.gathalast: Paranimmitavasavattinoparanimmitābhiratinoparanimmitābhiratino , maṇimhi passa nimmitaṃ.
Mandālakehi sañchannā, padumuppalakehi ca.
Cha piṅgalā pannarasa, haliddā ca catuddasa.
Indagopakavaṇṇābhā, tāva dissanti tiṃsati.
Missā bandhukapupphehi, nīluppalavicittikā.
Odhisuṅkaṃ mahārāja, passa tvaṃ dvipaduttama’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Upāgataṃ rāja mupehi lakkhaṃ, netādisaṃ maṇiratanaṃ tavatthi;
body.gathalast: Dhammena jissāmajiyyāmajiyyāmajiyyāma asāhasena, jito ca no khippamavākarohi.
Passantu note asaṭhena yuddhaṃ, na no sabhāyaṃ na karonti kiñci’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Te pāvisuṃ akkhamadena mattā, rājā kurūnaṃ puṇṇako cāpi yakkho;
body.gathalast: Rājā kaliṃ viccinamaggahesi, kaṭaṃ aggahī puṇṇako nāma yakkho.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Te tattha jūte ubhaye samāgate, raññaṃ sakāse sakhīnañca majjhe;
body.gathalast: Ajesi yakkho naravīraseṭṭhaṃ, tatthappanādo tumulo babhūva’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Jayo mahārāja parājayo ca, āyūhataṃ aññatarassa hoti;
body.gathalast: Janinda jīnosijinnosijitosijinomhi varaddhanena, jito ca me khippamavākarohi’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Hatthī gavassā maṇikuṇḍalā ca, yañcāpi mayhaṃ aññaṃ (ka.) ratanaṃ pathabyā;
body.gathalast: Gaṇhāhi kaccāna varaṃ dhanānaṃ, ādāya yenicchasi tena gaccha’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Hatthī gavassā maṇikuṇḍalā ca, yañcāpi tuyhaṃ ratanaṃ pathabyā;
body.gathalast: Tesaṃ varo vidhuro nāma kattā, so me jito taṃ me avākarohi’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Attā ca me so saraṇaṃ gatī ca, dīpo ca leṇo ca parāyaṇo ca;
body.gathalast: Asantuleyyo mama so dhanena, pāṇena me sādiso esa kattā’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ciraṃ vivādo mama tuyhañcassa, kāmañca pucchāma tameva gantvā;
body.gathalast: Esova no vivaratu etamatthaṃ, yaṃ vakkhatī hotu kathātathātathā ubhinnaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Addhā hi saccaṃ bhaṇasi, na ca māṇava sāhasaṃ;
body.gathalast: Tameva gantvā pucchāma, tena tussāmubho janā’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Saccaṃ nu devā vidahū kurūnaṃ, dhamme ṭhitaṃ vidhuraṃ nāmamaccaṃ;
body.gathalast: Dāsosi rañño uda vāsi ñāti, vidhuroti saṅkhā katamāsi loke’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Āmāyadāsāpi bhavanti heke, dhanena kītāpi bhavanti dāsā;
body.gathalast: Sayampi heke upayanti dāsā, bhayā paṇunnāpi bhavanti dāsā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ete narānaṃ caturova dāsā, addhā hi yonito ahampi jāto;
body.gatha2: Bhavo ca rañño abhavo ca rañño, dāsāhaṃ devassa parampi gantvā;
body.gathalast: Dhammena maṃ māṇava tuyha dajjā’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ayaṃayampiayampi dutīyo vijayo mamajja, puṭṭho hi kattā vivaretthavivaritthavivaritthavivarittha pañhaṃ;
body.gathalast: Adhammarūpo vata rājaseṭṭho, subhāsitaṃ nānujānāsi mayhaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Evaṃ ce no so vivarettha pañhaṃ, dāsohamasmi na ca khosmi ñāti;
body.gatha2: Gaṇhāhi kaccāna varaṃ dhanānaṃ, ādāya yenicchasi tena gaccha’’.
body.gathalast: Khemā vutti kathaṃ assa, kathannu assa saṅgaho.
Asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ, kathaṃ pecca na socati’’.
body.gatha1: Taṃ tattha gatimā dhitimā, matimā atthadassimā;
body.gathalast: Saṅkhātāsaṅkhāto sabbadhammānaṃ, vidhuro etadabravi.
Na seve lokāyatikaṃ, netaṃ paññāya vaḍḍhanaṃ.
Nivātavutti atthaddho, surato sakhilo mudu.
Tappeyya annapānena, sadā samaṇabrāhmaṇe.
Sakkaccaṃ payirupāseyya, sīlavante bahussute.
Khemā vutti siyā evaṃ, evaṃ nu assa saṅgaho.
Asmā lokā paraṃ lokaṃ, evaṃ pecca na socati’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ehi dāni gamissāma, dinno no issarena me;
body.gathalast: Mamevatthaṃtamevatthaṃ paṭipajja, esa dhammo sanantano’’.
Tīhañca taṃ vāsayemu agāre, yenaddhunā anusāsemu putte’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃ me tathā hotu vasemu tīhaṃ, kurutaṃ bhavajja gharesu kiccaṃ;
body.gathalast: Anusāsataṃ puttadāre bhavajja, yathā tayī pecca pacchā (sī. pī.) sukhī bhaveyya’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sādhūti vatvāna pahūtakāmo, pakkāmi yakkho vidhurena saddhiṃ;
body.gathalast: Taṃ kuñjarājaññahayānuciṇṇaṃ, pāvekkhi antepuramariyaseṭṭho’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Koñcaṃ mayūrañca piyañca ketaṃ, upāgami tattha surammarūpaṃ;
body.gathalast: Pahūtabhakkhaṃ bahuannapānaṃ, masakkasāraṃ viya vāsavassa’’.
Accharā viya devesu, nāriyo samalaṅkatā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Samaṅgikatvā pamadāhi yakkhaṃ, annena pānena ca dhammapālo;
body.gathalast: Atthatthaaggatthaaggattha mevānuvicintayanto, pāvekkhi bhariyāya tadā sakāse.
Bhariyaṃvacā ehi suṇohi bhoti, puttāni āmantaya tambanette.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sutvāna vākyaṃ patino anujjāanojāanojā , suṇisaṃvaca tambanakhiṃ sunettaṃ;
body.gathalast: Āmantaya vammadharāni cete, puttāni indīvarapupphasāme’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Te āgate muddhani dhammapālo, cumbitvā putte avikampamāno;
body.gathalast: Āmantayitvāna avoca vākyaṃ, dinnāhaṃ raññā idha māṇavassa.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Tassajjahaṃ attasukhī vidheyyo, ādāya yenicchati tena gacchati;
body.gathalast: Ahañca vo sāsitumāgatosmianusāsituṃ āgatosmianusāsituṃ āgatosmi , kathaṃ ahaṃ aparittāya gacche.
Kimābhijānātha pure purāṇaṃ, kiṃ vo pitā anusāse puratthā.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Samāsanā hotha mayāva sabbe, konīdha rañño abbhatiko manusso;
body.gatha2: Tamañjaliṃ kariya vadetha evaṃ, mā hevaṃ deva na hi esa dhammo;
body.gathalast: Viyaggharājassa nihīnajacco, samāsano deva kathaṃ bhaveyya’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘So ca putte mitte (sī. pī.) amacce ca, ñātayo suhadajjane;
body.gathalast: Alīnamanasaṅkappo, vidhuro etadabravi.
Yathā rājakulaṃ patto, yasaṃ poso nigacchati.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Na hi rājakulaṃ patto, aññāto labhate yasaṃ;
body.gathalast: Nāsūro nāpi dummedho, nappamatto kudācanaṃ.
Atha vissasate tyamhi, guyhañcassa na rakkhati.
Ajjhiṭṭho na vikampeyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
Sabbāni abhisambhonto, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Divā vā yadi vā rattiṃ, rājakiccesu paṇḍito;
body.gathalast: Ajjhiṭṭho na vikampeyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Divā vā yadi vā rattiṃ, rājakiccesu paṇḍito;
body.gathalast: Sabbāni abhisambhonto, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
Na tena vutto gaccheyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
Sabbattha pacchato gacche, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Na rañño sadisaṃ vatthaṃ, na mālaṃ na vilepanaṃ;
body.gatha2: Ākappaṃ sarakuttiṃ vā, na rañño sadisamācare;
body.gathalast: Aññaṃ kareyya ākappaṃ, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
Nāmacco rājabhariyāsu, bhāvaṃ kubbetha paṇḍito.
Manopaṇidhisampanno, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
Nāssa kosā dhanaṃ gaṇhe, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Na niddaṃ bahu maññeyyana niddannaṃ bahuṃ maññena niddannaṃ bahuṃ maññe , na madāya suraṃ pive;
body.gathalast: Nāssa dāye mige haññe, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Nāssa pīṭhaṃ na pallaṅkaṃ, na kocchaṃ na nāvaṃnāgaṃnāgaṃ rathaṃ;
body.gathalast: Sammatomhīti ārūhe, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
Sammukhañcassa tiṭṭheyya, sandissanto sabhattuno.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Na ve me (syā. ka.) rājā sakhā hoti, na rājā hoti methuno;
body.gathalast: Khippaṃ kujjhanti rājāno, sūkena’kkhīva ghaṭṭitaṃ.
Pharusaṃ patimanteyya, rājānaṃ parisaṃgataṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Laddhadvāro labhe dvāraṃladdhavārolabhe vāraṃ , neva rājūsu vissase;
body.gathalast: Aggīva saṃyato tiṭṭheaggīva yato tiṭṭheyyaaggīva yato tiṭṭheyya , sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Puttaṃ vā bhātaraṃ vā saṃ, sampaggaṇhāti khattiyo;
body.gatha2: Gāmehi nigamehi vā, raṭṭhehi janapadehi vā;
body.gathalast: Tuṇhībhūto upekkheyya, na bhaṇe chekapāpakaṃ.
Na tesaṃ antarā gacche, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
Paṭilomaṃ na vatteyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
Appāsī nipako sūro, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
Kāsaṃ sāsaṃ daraṃ balyaṃ, khīṇamedho nigacchati.
Avikiṇṇaṃ mitaṃ vācaṃ, patte kāle udīraye.
Samphaṃ giraṃ na bhāseyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
body.gatha1: ayaṃ gāthā natthi pī. potthake ‘‘Mātāpettibharo assa, kule jeṭṭhāpacāyiko;
body.gathalast: Saṇho sakhilasambhāso hiriottappasampanno (sī. ka.), sa rājavasatiṃ vase ayaṃ gāthā natthi pī. potthake.
Appamatto suci dakkho, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
Surato sukhasaṃvāso, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
Bhattāraññevudikkheyya, na ca aññassa rājino.
Sakkaccaṃ payirupāseyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
Sakkaccaṃ anuvāseyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
Tappeyya annapānena, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
Āsajja paññe sevetha, ākaṅkhaṃ vuddhimattano.
Na ca kiñci nivāreyya, dānakāle vaṇibbake.
Kālaññū samayaññū ca, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
Susaṃvihītakammanto, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Khalaṃ sālaṃ pasuṃ khettaṃ, gantā cassa abhikkhaṇaṃ;
body.gathalast: Mitaṃ dhaññaṃ nidhāpeyya, mitaṃva pācaye ghare.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Puttaṃ vā bhātaraṃ vā saṃ, sīlesu asamāhitaṃ;
body.gatha2: Anaṅgavā hi te bālā, yathā petā tatheva te;
body.gathalast: Coḷañca nesaṃ piṇḍañca, āsīnānaṃ padāpaye.
Dakkhe uṭṭhānasampanne, ādhipaccamhi ṭhāpaye.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sīlavā ca aloloalobhoalobho ca, anurakkhoanurattoanuratto ca rājino;
body.gathalast: Āvī raho hito tassa, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
Asaṅkusakavutti’ssa, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ucchādaye ca nhāpayeacchādane ca nhāpe caacchādane ca nhāpe ca , dhove pāde adhosiraṃ;
body.gathalast: Āhatopi na kuppeyya, sa rājavasatiṃ vase.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kumbhampañjaliṃ kariyākuriyā , cāṭañcāpi vāyasaṃ vā (sī. pī.) padakkhiṇaṃ;
body.gathalast: Kimeva sabbakāmānaṃ, dātāraṃ dhīramuttamaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yo deti sayanaṃ vatthaṃ, yānaṃ āvasathaṃ gharaṃ;
body.gathalast: Pajjunnoriva bhūtāni, bhogehi abhivassati.
Ārādhayati rājānaṃ, pūjaṃ labhati bhattusu’’.
Parikiṇṇo suhadehi, rājānamupasaṅkami.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Vanditvā sirasā pāde, katvā ca naṃ padakkhiṇaṃ;
body.gathalast: Vidhuro avaca rājānaṃ, paggahetvāna añjaliṃ.
Ñātīnatthaṃ pavakkhāmi, taṃ suṇohi arindama.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Putte ca me udikkhesi, yañca maññaṃ ghare dhanaṃ;
body.gathalast: Yathā pecca pacchā (syā. ka.) na hāyetha, ñātisaṅgho mayī gate.
Evetaṃ khalitaṃ mayhaṃ, etaṃ passāmi accayaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sakkā na gantuṃ iti mayha hoti, chetvā jhatvā (sī. pī.) vadhitvā idha kātiyānaṃ;
body.gathalast: Idheva hohī iti mayha ruccati, mā tvaṃ agā uttamabhūripañña’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Mā hevadhammesu manaṃ paṇīdahi, atthe ca dhamme ca yutto bhavassu;
body.gathalast: Dhiratthu kammaṃ akusalaṃ anariyaṃ, yaṃ katvā pacchā nirayaṃ vajeyya.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Nevesa dhammo na punetapunetipuneti kiccaṃ, ayiro hi dāsassa janinda issaro;
body.gathalast: Ghātetuṃ jhāpetuṃ athopi hantuṃ, na ca mayha kodhatthi vajāmi cāhaṃ’’.
Assupuṇṇehi nettehi, pāvisī so mahāgharaṃ’’.

Bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, vidhurassa nivesane.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Orodhā ca kumārā ca, vesiyānā ca brāhmaṇā;
body.gathalast: Bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, vidhurassa nivesane.

Mittāmacce ca bhacce ca suhajje (pī. ka.), puttadāre ca bandhave.
Nidhiñca iṇadānañca, puṇṇakaṃ etadabravi.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Avasī tuvaṃ mayha tīhaṃ agāre, katāni kiccāni gharesu mayhaṃ;
body.gathalast: Anusāsitā puttadārā mayā ca, karoma kaccāna kiccāni (syā. ka.) yathāmatiṃ te’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sace hi katte anusāsitā te, puttā ca dārā anujīvino ca;
body.gathalast: Handehi dānī taramānarūpo, dīgho hi addhāpi ayaṃ puratthā.
Idaṃ pacchimakaṃ tuyhaṃ, jīvalokassa dassanaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Sohaṃ kissa nu bhāyissaṃ, yassa me natthi dukkaṭaṃ;
body.gathalast: Kāyena vācā manasā, yena gaccheyya duggatiṃ’’.
Sākhāsu selesu asajjamāno, kālāgiriṃ khippamupāgamāsi’’.
Vidhuraṃ ādāya gacchati.
Vidhuraṃ ādāya gacchati.
Bāhā paggayha pakkanduṃ, paṇḍito so kuhiṃ gato.

Sabbe aggiṃ pavekkhāmapavissāma , natthattho jīvitena no’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Paṇḍito ca viyatto ca, vibhāvī ca vicakkhaṇo;
body.gathalast: Khippaṃ mociya attānaṃ, mā bhāyitthāgamissatikhippaṃ mocessata’ttānaṃ, mā bhātha āgamissatikhippaṃ mocessata’ttānaṃ, mā bhātha āgamissati’’ .
body.gatha1: ‘‘So tattha gantvāna vicintayanto, uccāvacā cetanakācetanatā bhavanti;
body.gathalast: Nayimassa jīvena mamatthi kiñci, hantvānimaṃ hadayamānayissaṃ’’ ādiyissaṃ (sī. pī.).
body.gatha1: ‘‘So tattha gantvā pabbatantarasmiṃpabbatapādasmiṃ , anto pavisitvāna paduṭṭhacitto;
body.gathalast: Asaṃvutasmiṃ jagatippadese, adhosiraṃ dhārayi kātiyāno.
body.gatha1: ‘‘So lambamāno narake papāte, mahabbhaye lomahaṃse vidugge;
body.gathalast: Asantasanto kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭho, iccabravi puṇṇakaṃ nāma yakkhaṃ.
body.paragraph: Accāhitaṃ kammaṃ karosi ludraṃ, bhāve ca te kusalaṃ natthi kiñci.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yaṃ maṃ papātasmiṃ papātumicchasi, ko nu tavattho maraṇena mayhaṃ;
body.gathalast: Amānusasseva tavajja vaṇṇo, ācikkha me tvaṃ katamāsi devatā’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yadi te suto puṇṇako nāma yakkho, rañño kuverassa hi so sajibbosajīvosajīvo ;
body.gathalast: Bhūmindharo varuṇo nāma nāgo, brahā sucī vaṇṇabalūpapanno.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Tassānujaṃ dhītaraṃ kāmayāmi, irandhatī nāma sā nāgakaññā;
body.gathalast: Tassā sumajjhāya piyāya hetu, patārayiṃ tuyha vadhāya dhīra’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Mā heva tvaṃ te (syā. ka.) yakkha ahosi mūḷho, naṭṭhā bahū duggahītena lokelokālokālokā ;
body.gathalast: Kiṃ te sumajjhāya piyāya kiccaṃ, maraṇena me iṅgha suṇomisuṇomasuṇoma sabbaṃ’’.
Taṃ yācamānaṃ sasuro avoca, yathā mamaññiṃsu sukāmanītaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Dajjemu kho te sutanuṃ sunettaṃ, sucimhitaṃ candanalittagattaṃ;
body.gatha2: Sace tuvaṃ hadayaṃ paṇḍitassa, dhammena laddhā idha māharesi;
body.gathalast: Etena vittena kumāri labbhā, naññaṃ dhanaṃ uttari patthayāma.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Evaṃ na mūḷhosmi suṇohi katte, na cāpi me duggahitatthi kiñci;
body.gathalast: Hadayena te dhammaladdhena nāgā, irandhatiṃ nāgakaññaṃ dadanti.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Tasmā ahaṃ tuyhaṃ vadhāya yutto, evaṃ mamattho maraṇena tuyhaṃ;
body.gathalast: Idheva taṃ narake pātayitvā, hantvāna taṃ hadayamānayissaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Khippaṃ mamaṃ uddhara kātiyāna, hadayena me yadi te atthi kiccaṃ;
body.gathalast: Ye kecime sādhunarassa dhammā, sabbeva te pātukaromi ajja’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘So puṇṇako kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭhaṃ, nagamuddhani khippaṃ patiṭṭhapetvā;
body.gathalast: Assatthamāsīnaṃ samekkhiyāna, paripucchi kattāramanomapaññaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Samuddhato mesi tuvaṃ papātā, hadayena te ajja mamatthi kiccaṃ;
body.gathalast: Ye kecime sādhunarassa dhammā, sabbeva me pātukarohi ajja’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Samuddhato tyasmi ahaṃ papātā, hadayena me yadi te atthi kiccaṃ;
body.gathalast: Ye kecime sādhunarassa dhammā, sabbeva te pātukaromi ajja’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yātānuyāyī ca bhavāhi māṇava, allañcaaddañcaaddañca pāṇiṃ parivajjayassu;
body.gathalast: Mā cassu mittesu kadāci dubbhī, mā ca vasaṃ asatīnaṃ nigacche’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kathaṃ nu yātaṃ anuyāyī hoti, allañca pāṇiṃ dahate kathaṃ so;
body.gathalast: Asatī ca kā ko pana mittadubbho, akkhāhi me pucchito etamatthaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Asanthutaṃasandhavaṃasandhavaṃ nopi ca diṭṭhapubbaṃ, yo āsanenāpi nimantayeyya;
body.gathalast: Tasseva atthaṃ puriso kareyya, yātānuyāyīti tamāhu paṇḍitā.
Na tassa pāpaṃ manasāpi cintaye, adubbhī pāṇiṃ dahate mittadubbho.
Na tassa sākhaṃ bhañjeyya, mittadubbho hi pāpako.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Puṇṇampi cemaṃ pathaviṃ dhanena, dajjitthiyā puriso sammatāya;
body.gathalast: Laddhā khaṇaṃ atimaññeyya tampi, tāsaṃ vasaṃ asatīnaṃ na gacche.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Evaṃ kho yātaṃ anuyāyī hoti, allañca pāṇiṃ dahate punevaṃ;
body.gathalast: Asatī ca sā so pana mittadubbho, so dhammiko hoti jahassu adhammaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Avasiṃ ahaṃ tuyhaṃ tīhaṃ agāre, annena pānena upaṭṭhitosmi;
body.gathalast: Mitto mamāsī visajjāmahaṃ taṃ, kāmaṃ gharaṃ uttamapañña gaccha.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Api hāyatu nāgakulānāgakulassanāgakulassanāgakulassa attho, alampi me nāgakaññāya hotu;
body.gathalast: So tvaṃ sakeneva subhāsitena, muttosi me ajja vadhāya pañña’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Handa tuvaṃ yakkha mamampi nehi, sasuraṃ tesassuraṃ nu tesassuraṃ nu tesassuraṃ nu tesassuraṃ nu te atthaṃ mayi carassu;
body.gathalast: Mayañca nāgādhipatiṃ vimānaṃ, dakkhemu nāgassa adiṭṭhapubbaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yaṃ ve narassa ahitāya assa, na taṃ pañño arahati dassanāya;
body.gathalast: Atha kena vaṇṇena amittagāmaṃ, tuvamicchasi uttamapañña gantuṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Addhā pajānāmi ahampi etaṃ, na taṃ pañño arahati dassanāya;
body.gathalast: Pāpañca me natthi kataṃ kuhiñci, tasmā na saṅke maraṇāgamāya’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Handa ca ṭhānaṃ atulānubhāvaṃ, mayā saha dakkhasi ehi katte;
body.gathalast: Yatthacchati naccagītehi nāgo, rājā yathā vessavaṇo naḷiññaṃniḷiññaṃniḷaññaṃ .
body.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃ nāgakaññā caritaṃ gaṇena, nikīḷitaṃ niccamaho ca rattiṃ;
body.gathalast: Pahūtamālyaṃ bahuttamallaṃ (ka.) bahupupphachannaṃbahupupphasañchannaṃ , obhāsatī vijjurivantalikkhe.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Annena pānena upetarūpaṃ, naccehi gītehi ca vāditehi;
body.gathalast: Paripūraṃ kaññāhi alaṅkatāhi, upasobhati vatthapilandhanenavatthapilandhanehi .
body.gatha1: ‘‘So puṇṇako kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭhaṃ, nisīdayī pacchato āsanasmiṃ;
body.gathalast: Ādāya kattāramanomapaññaṃ, upānayī bhavanaṃ nāgarañño.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Patvāna ṭhānaṃ atulānubhāvaṃ, aṭṭhāsi kattā pacchato puṇṇakassa;
body.gathalast: Sāmaggi pekkhamāno sāmaggipekkhī pana (sī. syā. pī.) nāgarājā, pubbeva jāmātaramajjhabhāsatha’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yannu tuvaṃ agamā maccalokaṃ, anvesamāno hadayaṃ paṇḍitassa;
body.gathalast: Kacci samiddhena idhānupatto, ādāya kattāramanomapaññaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ayañhi so āgato yaṃ tvamicchasi, dhammena laddho mama dhammapālo;
body.gathalast: Taṃ passatha sammukhātaṃ passa dhammaṃ samukhā bhāsamānaṃ, sukho havebhave sappurisehi saṅgamo’’.
Byamhito nābhivādesi, nayidaṃ paññavatāmiva’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Na camhi byamhito nāga, na ca maccubhayaṭṭito;
body.gathalast: Na vajjho abhivādeyya, vajjhaṃ vā nābhivādaye.
Yaṃ naro hantumiccheyya, taṃ kammaṃ nupapajjati’’.
Na vajjho abhivādeyya, vajjhaṃ vā nābhivādaye.
Yaṃ naro hantumiccheyya, taṃ kammaṃ nupapajjati’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Asassataṃ sassataṃ nu tavayidaṃ, iddhījutībalavīriyūpapattiiddhiṃ jutiṃ balaṃ vīriyūpapatti ;
body.gathalast: Pucchāmi taṃ nāgarājetamatthaṃ, kathaṃ nu te laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Adhiccaladdhaṃ pariṇāmajaṃ te, sayaṃkataṃ udāhu devehi dinnaṃ;
body.gathalast: Akkhāhi me nāgarājetamatthaṃ, yatheva te laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Nādhiccaladdhaṃ na pariṇāmajaṃ me, na sayaṃkataṃ nāpi devehi dinnaṃ;
body.gathalast: Sakehi kammehi apāpakehi, puññehi me laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Kiṃ te vataṃ kiṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, kissa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko;
body.gathalast: Iddhījutībalavīriyūpapatti, idañca te nāga mahāvimānaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Ahañca bhariyā ca manussaloke, saddhā ubho dānapatī ahumhā;
body.gathalast: Opānabhūtaṃ me gharaṃ tadāsi, santappitā samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca.
Acchādanaṃ sāyanamannapānaṃ, sakkacca dānāni adamha tattha.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Taṃ me vataṃ taṃ pana brahmacariyaṃ, tassa suciṇṇassa ayaṃ vipāko;
body.gathalast: Iddhījutībalavīriyūpapatti, idañca me dhīra mahāvimānaṃ’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Evaṃ ce te laddhamidaṃ vimānaṃ, jānāsi puññānaṃ phalūpapattiṃ;
body.gathalast: Tasmā hi dhammaṃ cara appamatto, yathā vimānaṃ puna māvasesi’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Nayidha santi samaṇabrāhmaṇā ca, yesannapānāni dademu katte;
body.gathalast: Akkhāhi me pucchito etamatthaṃ, yathā vimānaṃ puna māvasema’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Bhogī hi te santi idhūpapannā, puttā ca dārā anujīvino ca;
body.gathalast: Tesu tuvaṃ vacasā kammunā ca, asampaduṭṭho ca bhavāhi niccaṃ.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Evaṃ tuvaṃ nāga asampadosaṃ, anupālaya vacasā kammunā ca;
body.gathalast: Ṭhatvā idha yāvatāyukaṃ vimāne, uddhaṃ ito gacchasi devalokaṃ’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Addhā hi so socati rājaseṭṭho, tayā vinā yassa tuvaṃ sajibbo;
body.gathalast: Dukkhūpanītopi tayā samecca, vindeyya poso sukhamāturopi’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Addhā sataṃ bhāsasi nāga dhammaṃ, anuttaraṃ atthapadaṃ suciṇṇaṃ;
body.gathalast: Etādisiyāsu hi āpadāsu, paññāyate mādisānaṃ viseso’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Akkhāhi no tāyaṃ mudhā nu laddho, akkhehi no tāyaṃ ajesi jūte;
body.gathalast: Dhammena laddho iti tāyamāha mā’ya’māha (syā.), kathaṃ nu tvaṃ hatthamimassa māgato’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yo missaro tattha ahosi rājā, tamāyamakkhehi ajesi jūte;
body.gathalast: So maṃ jito rājā imassadāsi, dhammena laddhosmi asāhasena.
Hatthe gahetvāna anomapaññaṃ, pāvekkhi bhariyāya tadā sakāse.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Yena tvaṃ vimale paṇḍu, yena bhattaṃ na ruccati;
body.gathalast: Na ca me tādiso vaṇṇo, ayameso tamonudo.
Tassa vākyaṃ nisāmehi, dullabhaṃ dassanaṃ puna.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Disvāna taṃ vimalā bhūripaññaṃ, dasaṅgulī añjaliṃ paggahetvā;
body.gathalast: Haṭṭhena bhāvena patītarūpā, iccabravi kurūnaṃ kattuseṭṭhaṃ.
Byamhito nābhivādesi, nayidaṃ paññavatāmiva’’.
body.gatha1: ‘‘Na camhi byamhito nāgi, na ca maccubhayaṭṭito;
body.gathalast: Na vajjho abhivādeyya, vajjhaṃ vā nābhivādaye.
Yaṃ naro hantumiccheyya, taṃ kammaṃ nupapajjati’’.

Nandiṃ pavesinandi-ppavesinandi-ppavesinandi-ppavesi nagare, bandhanā mokkho aghosatha.
